title: The double PP. A papist im armes. Bearing ten seuerall sheilds. Encountred by the protestant. at ten seuerall weapons. A Iesuite marching before them.
author: Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632.
publisher: Imprinted by T[homas] C[reede] and are to be sold by Iohn Hodgets, at his shop in Paules Church-yard,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
